title: 让他给我回个电话

conversations.english: Hello. Can I talk to David?你好。能让David接电话吗？
conversations.chinese: 你好。能让David接电话吗？
conversations.reply_english: One second, please. ( a few seconds later, the receiver comes back and says) Hello?请稍等。（片刻后，接电话者返回并说）喂？
conversations.reply_chinese: 请稍等。（片刻后，接电话者返回并说）喂？

title: 我需要一些冰水

conversations.english: Hello. This is John’s Distribution. Can I help you?您好。这里是约翰配送。我能为您做什么？
conversations.chinese: 您好。这里是约翰配送。我能为您做什么？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I need some ice water delivered.我需要一些冰水。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我需要一些冰水。

title: 我的冰箱工作不太正常

conversations.english: Hello. This is Hamilton’s Heating and cooling service. Can I help you?您好。这里是哈密尔顿冷暖设备修理服务。我能帮您吗？
conversations.chinese: 您好。这里是哈密尔顿冷暖设备修理服务。我能帮您吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. My home freezer is not working properly.是的。我的冰箱工作不太正常。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。我的冰箱工作不太正常。

title: 我的账单的有问题

conversations.english: Hello. Can I help you?您好。我能帮您什么？
conversations.chinese: 您好。我能帮您什么？
conversations.reply_english: I need to talk with someone about my bill.是关于我的账单的问题。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是关于我的账单的问题。

title: 吸尘器想退换或修理

conversations.english: Hi, Customer Service Desk. What can I do for you today, sir?您好，客户服务柜台。先生，我能为您做什么？
conversations.chinese: 您好，客户服务柜台。先生，我能为您做什么？
conversations.reply_english: Good morning. I bought this vacuum here a few months ago. It doesn’t work now. Can I return it or get it fixed?早上好，我在几个月前买了这个吸尘器，现在它坏了。我能退换或者修理吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好，我在几个月前买了这个吸尘器，现在它坏了。我能退换或者修理吗？

title: 让他一会儿你打过去

conversations.english: Hello.你好。
conversations.chinese: 你好。
conversations.reply_english: Hi. Can I talk to Peter?你好。能让Peter接电话吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好。能让Peter接电话吗？

title: 我想和你谈谈

conversations.english: Hi, It’s Joseph.我是Joseph。
conversations.chinese: 我是Joseph。
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Joseph. How did you get my number?嘿，Joseph，你是怎么搞到我的号码的？
conversations.reply_chinese: 嘿，Joseph，你是怎么搞到我的号码的？

title: 可以告诉我那个电话的号码吗

conversations.english: Operator, can you give me any information on the call I just received?接线员，关于我刚刚接到的电话，能给我一些信息吗？
conversations.chinese: 接线员，关于我刚刚接到的电话，能给我一些信息吗？
conversations.reply_english: I don’t know who placed the call. However, the call was from Toronto.我不知道是谁打的电话，但是，它是从多伦多打过来的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不知道是谁打的电话，但是，它是从多伦多打过来的。

title: 这里是查号台

conversations.english: Hello. This is the Directory Assistance. Can I help you?您好。这里是查号台。我能帮您吗？
conversations.chinese: 您好。这里是查号台。我能帮您吗？
conversations.reply_english: Can you give me the number for Jessica Hanson on locks Ave?能告诉我住在Locks大街的Jessica Hanson的号码吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 能告诉我住在Locks大街的Jessica Hanson的号码吗？

title: 我想预定一辆出租车

conversations.english: Hello. Airway Transit Reservation service. How can I help you?您好，机场通勤预约服务。我能为您做什么？
conversations.chinese: 您好，机场通勤预约服务。我能为您做什么？
conversations.reply_english: Hi. I’m calling to reserve a taxi. I need a cab this Saturday morning.你好。我想订一辆出租车，这个周六的早上。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好。我想订一辆出租车，这个周六的早上。

title: 我可以换个号码吗

conversations.english: Hello. This is the Customer service. How can I help you?您好。这里是客户服务。能为您做什么？
conversations.chinese: 您好。这里是客户服务。能为您做什么？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I’ve been getting harassing calls recently. Can I have my phone number changed?是这样的，我最近总是接到骚扰电话。我可以换个号码吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是这样的，我最近总是接到骚扰电话。我可以换个号码吗？

title: 现在的信号不太好

conversations.english: Hello?你好。
conversations.chinese: 你好。
conversations.reply_english: Hi, David. You are very difficult to reach. I called several times. But I kept getting a busy signal. Is your phone out of order?你好，David。你可真难找啊。我打了好几次了，但每次都是忙音。你的电话欠费了？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，David。你可真难找啊。我打了好几次了，但每次都是忙音。你的电话欠费了？

title: 我的车坏了

conversations.english: Hello, towing service. What’s your problem?您好。拖车服务。您遇到什么问题了？
conversations.chinese: 您好。拖车服务。您遇到什么问题了？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I need a tow truck. My car is broken down.我需要一辆拖车。我的车坏了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我需要一辆拖车。我的车坏了。

title: 我可以换件毛衣吗

conversations.english: Hello. Thank you for calling Spend Mart.您好。感谢您致电Spend Mart。
conversations.chinese: 您好。感谢您致电Spend Mart。
conversations.reply_english: Is this the Customer Service Desk?请问是客户服务柜台吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 请问是客户服务柜台吗？

title: 我想激活语言信箱服务

conversations.english: Telco Mobile, how can I help you?这里是电话公司，需要什么服务？
conversations.chinese: 这里是电话公司，需要什么服务？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I’d like to activate my voice mail service please.我想激活语言信箱服务。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想激活语言信箱服务。

title: 打个电话即可激活电话机 Turning on

conversations.english: Hi, I’d like to have my phone turned on, please.你好，我想接通我的话机。
conversations.chinese: 你好，我想接通我的话机。
conversations.reply_english: At what address, sir?请问您的地址，先生。
conversations.reply_chinese: 请问您的地址，先生。

title: 你可以帮我捎个口信吗

conversations.english: Hello, is Marie Ward there, please?你好，请问你是Marie Ward吗？
conversations.chinese: 你好，请问你是Marie Ward吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'll see if she is in.我去看看她在不在。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我去看看她在不在。

title: 他出门了所以解不了电话

conversations.english: Hello, could I speak to Allison, please?你好，请找埃里森接电话，好吗？
conversations.chinese: 你好，请找埃里森接电话，好吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'm sorry; he's out at the moment.很抱歉，他现在还没回来。
conversations.reply_chinese: 很抱歉，他现在还没回来。

title: 欢迎拨打计算机技术帮助热线

conversations.english: Hello, thanks for calling 123 Tech Help, I’m Todd. How can I help you?你好，欢迎拨打123技术帮助，你需要什么帮助？
conversations.chinese: 你好，欢迎拨打123技术帮助，你需要什么帮助？
conversations.reply_english: Hello? Can you help me? My computer! Oh man...你好，你能帮帮我吗？我的计算机，天哪！
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，你能帮帮我吗？我的计算机，天哪！

title: 我需要撤消我的电话 Disconnect my phone

conversations.english: Hello. I need to disconnect my phone, please.你好，我需要撤消我的电话。
conversations.chinese: 你好，我需要撤消我的电话。
conversations.reply_english: All right. Where do you live, sir?好，您住在哪儿，先生？
conversations.reply_chinese: 好，您住在哪儿，先生？

title: 请帮我找一下雪莉 Could I speak to

conversations.english: Hello!喂!
conversations.chinese: 喂!
conversations.reply_english: Hello!Could I speak to Sheirly Lim please?喂，请找谢若利姆？
conversations.reply_chinese: 喂，请找谢若利姆？

title: 不过我还是过一会再给她打电话

conversations.english: Good morning．早上好。
conversations.chinese: 早上好。
conversations.reply_english: Good morning．This is Mary．Can I speak to Anne please?早上好。我是玛丽。我找安妮。
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好。我是玛丽。我找安妮。

title: 我想明晚请你吃饭

conversations.english: Hello, this is 57356475.你好，这里是57356475。
conversations.reply_english: Hello, this is John. I wanna speak to Linda, please.你好，我是约翰。我想和琳达说话。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，我是约翰。我想和琳达说话。

title: 我想打个对方付费的电话

conversations.english: I'd like to make an overseas call to Hong Kong and please make it collect.我想打个国外电话到香港，请打对方付费电话。
conversations.chinese: 我想打个国外电话到香港，请打对方付费电话。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, where to?是的，打到哪里呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，打到哪里呢？

title: 我们是合法注册登记的服务性慈善机构

conversations.english: Hello, my name is Petter, I'm calling on behalf of the Save the Children Fund. Have you heard of our organization before?你好!我是彼得,我代表救助儿童基金会给你打电话.你以前听说过我们这个机构吗？
conversations.chinese: 你好!我是彼得,我代表救助儿童基金会给你打电话.你以前听说过我们这个机构吗？
conversations.reply_english: Um...yes, I think so… Don't you do some kind of charity work, like taking care of starving children in Africa or something?恩,是的,我听说过…你们不是做些慈善工作吗?比如关心非洲忍饥挨饿的儿童或者类似的事情?
conversations.reply_chinese: 恩,是的,我听说过…你们不是做些慈善工作吗?比如关心非洲忍饥挨饿的儿童或者类似的事情?

title: 我还是待会儿再打电话来找找安妮好了

conversations.english: Good morning．早上好。
conversations.chinese: 早上好。
conversations.reply_english: Good morning．早上好。
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好。

title: 你是哪里 Informal phone call at home

conversations.english: Hello!喂!
conversations.chinese: 喂!
conversations.reply_english: Hello! Could I speak to Sheirly Lim please?喂，请找谢若利姆？
conversations.reply_chinese: 喂，请找谢若利姆？

title: 她要结婚怎么没有打电话通知我

conversations.english: Tom? Oh, it's been a while since we've talked to each other. Nice to hear you again.汤姆吗？噢，我们上次聊天到现在已经有一阵子了。很高兴又见到你。
conversations.chinese: 汤姆吗？噢，我们上次聊天到现在已经有一阵子了。很高兴又见到你。
conversations.reply_english: Same here. Hey, did you know Susan is going to get married. She invited me to her wedding and she wants you to attend also.也是在这里。嘿，你知不知道苏珊要结婚了。她邀请我去参加婚礼，她希望你也能出席。
conversations.reply_chinese: 也是在这里。嘿，你知不知道苏珊要结婚了。她邀请我去参加婚礼，她希望你也能出席。

title: 电话信号实在是太差了 The line is terrible

conversations.english: Hello,can I speak to Mark Wyatt,please?喂，请找Mark Wyatt.
conversations.chinese: 喂，请找Mark Wyatt.
conversations.reply_english: I am sorry. I can’t hear your very clearly. Could you say that again,please?对不起，我听不太清楚，可以请你再说一次吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 对不起，我听不太清楚，可以请你再说一次吗？

title: 只有遇到紧急情况的时候给我打电话

conversations.english: This is the operator, how may I help you?我是话务员，有什么需要帮助的吗？
conversations.chinese: 我是话务员，有什么需要帮助的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I would like to make a collect call.是的，我想打个对方付费的电话。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我想打个对方付费的电话。

title: 激活电话语音留言信箱

conversations.english: Telco Mobile, how can I help you?这里是电话公司，需要什么服务？
conversations.chinese: 这里是电话公司，需要什么服务？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I’d like to activate my voice mail service please.我想激活语言信箱服务。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想激活语言信箱服务。

title: 剧院订票 Reservations

conversations.english: Good morning. Vane Theater, at your service.早上好。范恩剧院，愿为您效劳。
conversations.chinese: 早上好。范恩剧院，愿为您效劳。
conversations.reply_english: Hello. I'm thinking about watching a Chinese traditional opera with a foreign girl. What's on this weekend?你好。我打算和一个外国女孩看一场中国的传统戏剧。这个周末上演什么剧？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好。我打算和一个外国女孩看一场中国的传统戏剧。这个周末上演什么剧？
